settings.category:
<setting id="xmltv_output_folder" label="xmltv Output Folder " type="folder" default="" /> <setting id="xmltv_name" label="xmltv File Name " type="text" default="xmltv.xml" />
<setting label="Days " type="number" id="timespan" default="1"/>
<setting label="Proxy " type="text" id="proxy" default=""/> <setting label="user " type="text" id="proxy_user" default=""/> <setting label="password " type="text" id="proxy_password" default=""/>
<setting label="User Agent " type="text" id="user_agent" default=""/>
<setting id="logging" type="enum" label="Logging " values="on|off" />
<setting id="mode" type="select" label="Mode " values="default|debug|measure|nomark|verify|wget" default="0"/> <setting type="lsep" label="Postprocess " /> <setting id="mdb" type="bool" label="mdb " default="false"/> <setting id="rex" type="bool" label="rex " default="false"/>
